about_the_game:
Anant Shrankhla is a First-Person Mystery Adventure Game set in India.

This Game is set in present-day India, its story about a clueless protagonist who finds himself in the middle of some unknown place in Himalayas.

The story revolves around some mysterious voices, places and stories. This heart-pumping adventure is a journey through multiple historical Indian landmarks and their mysteries that will lead our protagonist to realize his true purpose.

So come'on.... Trek, Venture and Uncover the mysteries of Anant Shrankhla

This Project was also previously also known as " ABE CHUP : A Mysterious journey " and is now changed to "Anant Shrankhla" a phrase that means An Infinite Sequence....
And this game project is currently under development and being developed by an Indian game studio named Insanity Crew Games.

This project was initially started by a Popular Game Development Youtube Creator, AsasinoManik.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be violence, gore, dead bodies, blood, skeletons , decayed body parts and several depiction of drug consumption throughout the gameplay.
